verses.verse: כָּרַ֥ע <WH3766> boweth down בֵּל֙ <WH1078> Bel קֹרֵ֣ס <WH7164> stoopeth נְב֔וֹ <WH5015> Nebo הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> become עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֔ם <WH6091> their idols לַחַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> were upon the beasts וְלַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and upon the cattle נְשֻׂאֹתֵיכֶ֣ם <WH5385> your carriages עֲמוּס֔וֹת <WH6006> [were] heavy loaden מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> [they are] a burden לַעֲיֵפָֽה׃ <WH5889> to the weary

קָרְס֤וּ <WH7164> They stoop כָֽרְעוּ֙ <WH3766> they bow down יַחְדָּ֔ו <WH3162> together לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָכְל֖וּ <WH3201> they could מַלֵּ֣ט <WH4422> not deliver מַשָּׂ֑א <WH4853> the burden וְנַפְשָׁ֖ם <WH5315> but themselves בַּשְּׁבִ֥י <WH7628> into captivity הָלָֽכָה׃ <WH1980> are gone ס

שִׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> Hearken אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> unto me O house יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> and all the remnant בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel הַֽעֲמֻסִים֙ <WH6006> which are borne מִנִּי־ <WH4480> from בֶ֔טֶן <WH990> [by me] from the belly הַנְּשֻׂאִ֖ים <WH5375> which are carried מִנִּי־ <WH4480> from רָֽחַם׃ <WH7356> from the womb

וְעַד־ <WH5704> and even זִקְנָה֙ <WH2209> And [even] to [your] old age אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I ה֔וּא <WH1931> will be the same וְעַד־ <WH5704> and even שֵיבָ֖ה <WH7872> I [am] he and [even] to hoar hairs אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אֶסְבֹּ֑ל <WH5445> will I carry אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I עָשִׂ֙יתִי֙ <WH6213> [you] I have made וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אֶשָּׂ֔א <WH5375> and I will bear וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> I אֶסְבֹּ֖ל <WH5445> even I will carry וַאֲמַלֵּֽט׃ <WH4422> and will deliver ס
לְמִ֥י <WH4310> to whom תְדַמְי֖וּנִי <WH1819> To whom will ye liken וְתַשְׁו֑וּ <WH7737> me and make [me] equal וְתַמְשִׁל֖וּנִי <WH4911> and compare וְנִדְמֶֽה׃ <WH1819> me that we may be like

הַזָּלִ֤ים <WH2107> They lavish זָהָב֙ <WH2091> gold מִכִּ֔יס <WH3599> out of the bag וְכֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> silver בַּקָּנֶ֣ה <WH7070> in the balance יִשְׁקֹ֑לוּ <WH8254> and weigh יִשְׂכְּר֤וּ <WH7936> [and] hire צוֹרֵף֙ <WH6884> a goldsmith וְיַעֲשֵׂ֣הוּ <WH6213> and he maketh אֵ֔ל <WH410> it a god יִסְגְּד֖וּ <WH5456> they fall down אַף־ <WH637> indeed יִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּֽוּ׃ <WH7812> yea they worship

יִ֠שָּׂאֻהוּ <WH5375> They bear עַל־ <WH5921> upon כָּתֵ֨ף <WH3802> him upon the shoulder יִסְבְּלֻ֜הוּ <WH5445> they carry וְיַנִּיחֻ֤הוּ <WH3240> him and set him in his place תַחְתָּיו֙ <WH8478> place וְיַֽעֲמֹ֔ד <WH5975> and he standeth מִמְּקוֹמ֖וֹ <WH4725> from his place לֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יָמִ֑ישׁ <WH4185> shall he not remove אַף־ <WH637> Though יִצְעַ֤ק <WH6817> yea [one] shall cry אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יַעֲנֶ֔ה <WH6030> unto him yet can he not answer מִצָּרָת֖וֹ <WH6869> him out of his trouble לֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot יוֹשִׁיעֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH3467> nor save ס

זִכְרוּ־ <WH2142> Remember זֹ֖את <WH2063> yourselves וְהִתְאֹשָׁ֑שׁוּ <WH377> this and shew yourselves men הָשִׁ֥יבוּ <WH7725> bring [it] again פוֹשְׁעִ֖ים <WH6586> O ye transgressors עַל־ <WH5921> and לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> to mind

זִכְר֥וּ <WH2142> Remember רִאשֹׁנ֖וֹת <WH7223> the former things מֵעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> of old כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I אֵל֙ <WH410> for I [am] God וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and there ע֔וֹד <WH5750> other אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> and [there is] none else [I am] God וְאֶ֥פֶס <WH657> and [there is] none כָּמֽוֹנִי׃ <WH3644> like

מַגִּ֤יד <WH5046> Declaring מֵֽרֵאשִׁית֙ <WH7225> from the beginning אַחֲרִ֔ית <WH319> the end וּמִקֶּ֖דֶם <WH6924> and from ancient times אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> have not נַעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> [the things] that are not [yet] done אֹמֵר֙ <WH559> saying עֲצָתִ֣י <WH6098> My counsel תָק֔וּם <WH6965> shall stand וְכָל־ <WH3605> all חֶפְצִ֖י <WH2656> all my pleasure אֶעֱשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> and I will do

קֹרֵ֤א <WH7121> Calling מִמִּזְרָח֙ <WH4217> from the east עַ֔יִט <WH5861> a ravenous bird מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> country מֶרְחָ֖ק <WH4801> from a far אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the man [עֲצָתֹו כ] (עֲצָתִ֑י <WH6098> advice ק) אַף־ <WH637> Truly דִּבַּ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH1696> yea I have spoken אַף־ <WH637> truly אֲבִיאֶ֔נָּה <WH935> [it] I will also bring יָצַ֖רְתִּי <WH3335> it to pass I have purposed אַף־ <WH637> truly אֶעֱשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <WH6213> [it] I will also do ס
שִׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> Hearken אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about אַבִּ֣ירֵי <WH47> strong לֵ֑ב <WH3820> care for הָרְחוֹקִ֖ים <WH7350> that [are] far from מִצְּדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> righteousness

קֵרַ֤בְתִּי <WH7126> I bring near צִדְקָתִי֙ <WH6666> my righteousness לֹ֣א <WH3808> is not תִרְחָ֔ק <WH7368> it shall not be far off וּתְשׁוּעָתִ֖י <WH8668> and my salvation לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not תְאַחֵ֑ר <WH309> shall not tarry וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> and I will place בְצִיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> in Zion תְּשׁוּעָ֔ה <WH8668> salvation לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> for Israel תִּפְאַרְתִּֽי׃ <WH8597> my glory ס
